about_the_game:
Play the Memory's Reach pre-alpha demo!

This demo takes about 15 to 20 minutes to play through and is designed to give you a small taste of what you can expect from the full game.

If you enjoy your experience, please give the game a wishlist and share your thoughts online - we would love to hear about it. Head over to the community forums to leave your feedback. You are also free to stream, record, and share footage of this demo online and on social media. Please tag us if you do!

As this game is still under development, nothing you see, hear, or play in this demo should be considered "final". You may also experience bugs or other issues while you play, if you do please let us know about them on the community forums - this demo will be updated with bug fixes and new features as development continues.

Enjoy the demo, and don't forget to wishlist Memory's Reach on Steam! :D

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.6GHz Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 10 series or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recomended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recomended

reviews:
“A Metroid Prime with no combat, thoughtful puzzles and an interesting story? Hook it into my veins. I played Memory’s Reach on Friday and it remained my game of PAX for the remainder of the show.”
Kotaku AU - PAX Aus 2023: Renee’s Annual Indie Roundup

“For those that love the Metroid style of slowly expanding a map and doubling back with upgraded abilities, Memory’s Reach can scratch that itch. It’s also got some of the most striking 3D visuals of any game at the show.”
Kotaku AU - PAX Aus 2023: David’s Indie Demo Picks
short_description: Explore labyrinthian megastructures, solve mind-bending puzzles, and wield fantastic alien technology in a puzzling metroidvania adventure. Play the Memory's Reach pre-alpha demo now!
